mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.member_name AS "memberName", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.address AS "address", a.member_id AS "dkMember.id", a.total_fee AS "totalFee", a.product_type AS "productType", a.sale_by AS "tuser.id", a.connection_ratio AS "connectionRatio", a.review_status AS "reviewStatus", a.review_by AS "ruser.id", a.is_review AS "isReview", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", dkMember.name AS "dkMember.name", tuser.name AS "tuser.name", ruser.name AS "ruser.name"

LEFT JOIN dk_member dkMember ON dkMember.id = a.member_id LEFT JOIN sys_user tuser ON tuser.id = a.sale_by LEFT JOIN sys_user ruser ON ruser.id = a.review_by LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = tuser.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dk_quotation( id, name, member_name, mobile, address, member_id, total_fee, product_type, sale_by, connection_ratio, review_status, review_by, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{memberName}, #{mobile}, #{address}, #{dkMember.id}, #{totalFee}, #{productType}, #{tuser.id}, #{connectionRatio}, #{reviewStatus}, #{ruser.id}, #{remark}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dk_quotation SET name = #{name}, member_name = #{memberName}, mobile = #{mobile}, address = #{address}, member_id = #{dkMember.id}, total_fee = #{totalFee}, product_type = #{productType}, sale_by = #{tuser.id}, connection_ratio = #{connectionRatio}, review_status = #{reviewStatus}, review_by = #{ruser.id}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
